Interface Glitch

All Known Subinterfaces:
Hope<T>, Nope, SingleError
public interface Glitch
Custom action in case of error

  • Method Details

    • onFailure

      void onFailure(@NotNull @NotNull Consumer<Failure> errorAction)
      Set the action in case of failure

      If there are no errors, the action is not performed

      Parameters:
      errorAction - action to be taken in case of failure

    • orThrow

      Generate a FailureException in case of error
      Parameters:
      fcn - transformation of Failure to FailureException
      Throws:
